1.9.2.name: wordpress/flv-flash-fullscreen-video-player
1.9.2.description:
Embed flash videos using the "FLV Flash Fullscreen Video Player". The FLV Player can be configured under "Options > FLV Player". How to use: [flashvideo video=demo-video.flv /].

The website to the player is: http://www.video-flash.de/flv-flash-fullscreen-video-player/ Here's a link to my website: http://www.video-flash.de
